item.title: Gallery with image processing
item.description:
Demo with images from pixabay.com

using shortcode: 
{{< res-gallery match="**/pixabay.com/*" caption-position="bottom" caption-effect="fade" hover-effect="slideup" >}}

See more here

  • More examples:
    Images taken from ...

item.title: Image Processing (`res-figure`)
item.description: Image page resources can be resized and cropped. This only works for images which are page resources, not for images in the /static folder. This theme provides a shortcode res-figure for page resource image processing.
